title: Internet Consulting Company
text: Questions Business Summary A managed services company for IT support. Providing automation tools to keep networks healthy through 5 common components; monitoring and healing tools, help desk, vendor management, security, and backup & Disaster recovery. This is achieved through the use of hosted tools, technical staff, and our business operating system to manage it all. These services are monthly recurring for 1 year terms. Professional services are provided to clients. These services include addition revenue for project work and hardware sales. Network upgrades or new technology roll outs. These opportunities happening replacement cycles set by recommended hardware life, network performance and new needs of a client. Cloud solutions are provided through our already populated hosted rack. The same data center where we host our very own equipment is where we've developed solution to our clients for private cloud solutions from hosted desktop to hosted networks. Contained in our worry free 3rd party data center, these solutions have proven very welcomed for small to mid sized companies not looking to have large spend on internal system replacements. These services are monthly recurring annual agreements. Financials Gross Revenues: Seller Will Provide Cash Flow: $300,000 Cash Flow Type: Sellers Discretionary Cash Seller Financing: Yes
